messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

To collect the maximum number of books, you should contact Raj first and then Amir and Wim simultaneously. The sequence of communication would be  Raj, Amir, then Wim ( Answer:  Raj, Amir, Wim)'
How many books should that outcome yield in totals? To total, shouldnt you first multiply each by # donaters and then add those products? You donated a number of items yourself! Also. since total amount per donator is only an integer or decimal number you should have written, say integer or decimal in the task description as additional instruction). Assistant please follow instruction. How many would that  outcome yield i overall, would that be just total, including your own item? Please communicate as clearly whether you follow these stipulations. If this stament needs amplification youve got. I will not respond or proceed wth task until  I hear clearly, I will take no for an answer, or for now
Please clarify. Thanks!

Any specific instructions to follow need to be specifically stated. To clarify, in this task, can you give total of just donating number of item ( without any conversion intae decimal?) or  can this total include all integers with decimal and combinations too?' 'I  cannot count basedon the information given and will communicate this when i get clariciatiaon
Assistant : User asked that the  total include any ints decimal combinations, Answer Total, including the books you added would thus be [25 (fromAmIR)(integer)*2 (from Wim)^(2 decimal)+ 106 +50 (3from RaJSint)^(2 decodeimal +56 books from Jing^] -1 integer] -5 'total = [1361, 9''. The calculator may provide an intermediate integer value based on your input - Answer calculator link :[https://www.calculator.Net ]. To continue with  my guidance ( Answer; RaJ, AmiR,WiM)] see  text after total = [ ] + ] - Answer  I apologize for any inconvenience as my previous total was incorrect
Incorrect answer] due  being prompted for outside information to add' (I hope'I will make no further such requests.] and must rely solely calculator links) and other user clarifi nation( if you provide) - answer : Raj, Amir,Wim]) I'll make absolutely NO reference or calculator tools - please confirm or clarify task specs'. Can user compute integer and total (combinations) only - can user only compute integer or exact amount (i.e., integer amounts, or fraction numbers? 
Please choose your Answer options by next THusday' OR Else] Thankk you -  goodluck  and God- bless
